attributes.action: Support Israel's right to self defense
attributes.additional_details: Israel has endured terrible attacks against its citizens, in the form of rocket attacks, bombs and horrific murders against men women & children, by terrorists indoctrinated with a vile hatred of Israel & the Jewish people, a hatred comparable to Nazism. Israel has the right to defend itself against these attacks & we request that Her Majesties Government vocally support Israel & make it clear publicly that the United Kingdom stands by Israel, a democratic country, in its defensive fight against this aggression, a fight which also contributes to the world fight against international terrorism.
